imdb.plot outline: An international self-hate coach teaches people how to hate themselves more deeply than they ever thought possible. She's like a Tony Robbins, for self-hate who leads workshops around the world to help celebrities and regular people find personal freedom through self-hate. In this series, the premise is that she's finally releasing her amazing "self-hate" video series for public consumption.
imdb.title: How to Hate Yourself
